name: Onix-Systems, LLC
description:
Onix-Systems is an established outsourced IT service provider that offers an array of consulting and development services from IT infrastructure to web/iOS/Android applications. The company currently employs a team of more than 150 professionals and has successfully delivered more than 1,000 projects worldwide since its start in 2000. 
Our company’s main office is located in Kropyvnytkyi, Ukraine. We have also established partnership with Alternative Spaces, a U.S.-based company in the San Francisco Bay Area that serves as an official representative of Onix-Systems in the U.S. and other English-speaking countries.  
The passion for bringing new technologies to clients has been part of the company’s concept from the beginning. Onix-Systems works primarily with mid-sized companies who want stable and long-term relationships for their outsourced IT needs, that include web and mobile development. Onix-Systems also works with Fortune 500 companies and startup companies that are looking to build long-term and reliable relationships as their companies grow.
Onix-Systems is focused on providing excellent customer service and creating new solutions that will offer better opportunities for businesses of our clients.
